name: Heraldz!: But You Can't Jump (Play Test)
name_original: Heraldz!: But You Can't Jump (Play Test)
description:
Developer : Aidan Verdugo

This is an unfinished version of my new game Hurtalz. I'm uploading this to get feedback on game play, features,  and bugs. This game will be getting a full release on Android, IOS, Windows, and here on the web! Thanks for the feedback and I hope to release it soon. Enjoy the play test!
